name: Bullets and Asteroids
description:
A Shootem Up about shooting enemies and avoiding both enemy fire as well as asteroid debris.

Both you and your enemy's fire could trigger an asteroid explosion causing asteroid bits to hit the either of you, the more the asteroids the more the hazards, which could also work to your advantage.

There are 3 levels:

The first one spawns a preset amount of enemies, which spawn the next after each kill, an easy introduction to the game.

The second level is about surviving within a time limit, pick ups are introduced to help you survive but it is difficult to last.

The third is a bossfight with three unique stages, new phases test out your maneuvering abilities in interesting ways.

If you can't beat the second level, please go to the main menu, level select and try the third level, I put a lot of effort into it and am hoping you will be impressed.

By Jebara Al Falahi
